mapper.select: select *,(select count(1) from t_sys_premission where pid=a.id) childcount from t_sys_premission a

select p.*,(select count(1) from t_sys_premission where pid=p.id) childcount from t_sys_user u LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_user sru on u.id= sru.Sys_User_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role r on sru.Sys_Role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_permission_role spr on spr.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_premission p on p.id =spr.permission_id where u.id=#{userId} ORDER BY p.order_num ASC
